com.intel.realsense.tracking

Interface TrackingPose

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable

    public interface TrackingPose
extends java.lang.Cloneable

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      TrackingPose clone()
      Returns a clone of this object
      Float3 getAcceleration()
      Returns the acceleration of the pose translation component.
      Float3 getAngularAcceleration()
      Returns the angular acceleration of the pose rotation component
      Float3 getAngularVelocity()
      Returns the angular velocity of the pose rotation component.
      int getDeviceIndex()
      Returns the device index; 0 - HMD 1 - Controller #1 2 - Controller #2
      Float4 getRotation()
      Returns a quaternion representing the pose rotation component.
      long getSystemTimestamp()
      Returns the device timestamp of the sensor event that was used to generate this pose data in the system's clock
      long getTimestamp()
      Returns the device timestamp of the sensor event that was used to generate this pose data.
      int getTrackerConfidence()
      Returns the Tracker confidence.
      Float3 getTranslation()
      Returns the pose translation in meters.
      Float3 getVelocity()
      Returns the velocity of the pose translation component.
      java.lang.String toFormattedString()
      Returns a formatted string of the pose data.
